**ZipVPS/Holoshed Technologies Flashcache Backed KVM VPS Servers Beta**

I am running a public beta for a few VPS servers to test how it all runs under a bit more stress.

The node has been running quite well for a couple months with my own VMs running on it and it has handled very well so this is the next step before launch.

The beta offering is for 3 days from account activation and costs nothing for that time. All orders must pass fraud check with legit account information to be activated.

During the beta period there will be unannounced reboots to test for disk stability, otherwise everything will remain up and active during this time.

The usual Linux distributions are available for your VPS to use during testing and you are free to do as many reloads via SolusVM as you wish.

VPS Servers activated within 4-6 hours of order, maybe quicker.

# Beta VPS Specs
* 50GB Flashcache backed Raid10 HDD Space
* 1024MB Guaranteed RAM
* 1TB Gigabit Transfer
* Free for 3 days
* Location: Buffalo, NY

[Flashcache Beta VPS Signup Link](https://cs.holoshed.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=5)
